column3:
I just tried importing from transifex myself and get the same result. So you did nothing wrong. I still can't explain it though.

Edit: seems that the message was in the translations and one of the duplicates is now removed. OK.
Huh, it may be that something went wrong. For example, why is this message being removed from all languages? It's still there in `forms/addressbookpage.ui`.\n

I'm rather sure this was removed, because of the bitcoingui.cpp cleanup I did some time ago. That string was a tooltip as far as I remember. And it is still used and in the translation files for the sign/verify message dialog.

Edit: Found it: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/1705/files#L1L229
